attributes.action: allow businesses and residential developments the right to not put up No smoking signs in entrance halls where they have successfully self administered a no smoking policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is offensive and demeaning to enforce that buildings put up No smoking signs where they have successfully been enforcing a strict no smoking policy for years.  This nanny state that has been created is now insisting that we cannot be trusted with their new policy and in order to remind everyone signage must be put up everywhere.  It is also against policy to urinate in public places however is the next signage this government is going to ask us to put up in our shop windows and entrances to our residential buildings?
